word: 23-27 (see EGW on Romans 7:7-9). God's Moral Looking Glass.--[James 1:23-27 quoted.] This is the word of the living God. The law is God's great moral looking glass. Man is to compare his words, his spirit, his actions with the Word of God. . . . True religion means living the Word in your practical life. Your profession is not of any value without the practical doing of the Word (MS 7, 1898).
